name: Soul & Corpse
description:
"Death isn't the end" - MiniJam 102 Limitation

Not sure how well i fullfilled the limitation but here is my submission for the Jam :D

In this game your objective is to finish each level while solving the easy puzzles! It also only has 4 Levels because i am uncreative and i had no time anymore.

The concept is pretty simple;

Touch a pentagram and you die

Touch a cross and your corpse gets teleported to your soul

Be near your corpse to take over your body again

And be aware that some blocks are only pass through in specific forms

Have fun! ^^
